value="Actor" style="shape=umlActor;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;verticalAlign=top;html=1;outlineConnect=0;fillColor=#FFFFFF;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="80" y="180" width="30" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="SSoZlEEdxV4zL4xD8buy-3" value="" style="endArrow=none;html=1;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;dashed=1;strokeWidth=1;endFill=0;endArrow=open;curved=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;"
